property.name: bigtable
property.value: insert into pro_bigtable values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE adduserCount = ?,visitCount = ?,userCount = ?,addmemberCount = ?,activeCount = ?,memberCount = ?,sessionnumberCount = ?,sessionlengthCount = ?,averagesessionlength = ?

property.name: bigtablebrowser
property.value: insert into pro_bigtablebrowser values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE adduserCount = ?,visitCount = ?,userCount = ?,addmemberCount = ?,activeCount = ?,memberCount = ?,sessionnumberCount = ?,sessionlengthdvalue = ?,sessionlengthCount = ?,averagesessionLength = ?,browserPv = ?

property.name: region
property.value: insert into pro_region values(?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regioncount = ?, sessionnumber = ?,sessionjumpnumber = ?, jumprate = ?

property.name: visitdepth
property.value: insert into pro_visitdepth values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: order
property.value: insert into pro_order values(?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE oid = ?,successCount = ?,refundCount = ?,orderNumber = ?,orderCount = ?

property.name: externallink
property.value: insert into pro_externallink values(?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE external = ?,externalJump = ?,jumpRate = ?

property.name: year
property.value: insert into rea_year values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE amount = ?

property.name: mounth
property.value: insert into rea_mounth values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE amount = ?

property.name: day
property.value: insert into rea_day values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE amount = ?

property.name: type
property.value: insert into rea_type values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: rea_region
property.value: insert into rea_region values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: housing
property.value: insert into rea_housing values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?

property.name: area
property.value: insert into rea_area values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = ?
